name: awscli-v2

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This package provides a unified command line interface to Amazon Web
Services.

dependencies.name: py-awscrt
dependencies.description: Python 3 bindings for the AWS Common Runtime.

dependencies.name: py-cryptography
dependencies.description:
cryptography is a package which provides cryptographic recipes and
primitives to Python developers

dependencies.name: py-distro
dependencies.description: Distro - an OS platform information API.

dependencies.name: py-docutils
dependencies.description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-prompt-toolkit
dependencies.description: Library for building powerful interactive command lines in Python

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml
dependencies.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order

dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml-clib
dependencies.description:
C version of reader, parser and emitter for ruamel.yaml derived from
libyaml.

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
